attributes.additional_details: Facebook are closing accounts that are opened by a third party ie human on behalf of an animal friend, as you may know or even heard off our friend Olly Cat she lived at Manchester airport for many years outside Olympic House she even had a plane named after her after winning a facebook competion,she was retired from the airport around two years ago but has kept in touch with all her friends world wide and at the airport though fb but this is to be closed what harm is this account doing to anyone plesse sign if you know Olly Cat she needs our help
